user.title: SolidGPS Tracker
user.description: Enter your SolidGPS device credentials. You can find these in your SolidGPS dashboard URL.

data_description.imei: The IMEI number of your SolidGPS tracker
data_description.auth_code: Authentication code from your SolidGPS dashboard URL (auth_code parameter)
data_description.tracking_code: Tracking code from your SolidGPS dashboard URL (tracking_code parameter)
data_description.device_name: Custom name for this tracker. Defaults to 'SolidGPS' followed by last 4 digits of IMEI

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate SolidGPS
reauth_confirm.description: Your SolidGPS credentials have expired. Please re-enter them.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to SolidGPS API
